alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:42PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
